name: wp-proud-admin
description: Administration theme, permissions tweaks, and ProudCity settings pages. [ProudCity](http://proudcity.com) is a Wordpress platform for modern, standards-compliant municipal websites.

scripts.projectsetup: bower install && rm -rf bower_components/proudcity-patterns && git clone git@github.com:proudcity/proudcity-patterns.git bower_components/proudcity-patterns
